client.poller

Class Poller

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.poller.Poller

  • public class Poller
extends java.lang.Object
    Will take care of contacting the server on regular intervals to check for game updates.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Poller()
      A timer that will start contacting the server every SERVER_CONTACT_INTERVAL secs to check for version updates of the game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setClientModel(ClientModel cm)
      Adds the game model we will use, so we have access to the version
      void startPoller()
      Starts the mTimer, which starts up the polling
      void stopPoller()
      Stops the mTimer, which stops the polling

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Poller

        public Poller()
        A timer that will start contacting the server every SERVER_CONTACT_INTERVAL secs to check for version updates of the game. Also sets up a ActionListener called poll that is the actual item that will be run every SERVER_CONTACT_INTERVAL secs.
        Postcondition:
        This provides a timer that will poll the server

    • Method Detail

      • startPoller

        public void startPoller()
        Starts the mTimer, which starts up the polling
        Postcondition:
        the timer will be started

      • stopPoller

        public void stopPoller()
        Stops the mTimer, which stops the polling
        Postcondition:
        the timer will have stoped

      • setClientModel

        public void setClientModel(ClientModel cm)
        Adds the game model we will use, so we have access to the version
        Parameters:
        cm - a ClientModel
